item.description: There will be a sign at the entrance to the driveway of the police station.
item.how_to_find_us: Enter the driveway of the Belchertown Police Station which is on State St. (RT. 202), drive past the station to a stop sign. You will see the American Legion directly in front of you across from the stop sign. There is ample parking.
item.why: Agenda: To discuss more details for our paper. Topics to discuss: contact businesses to advertise in the paper, ideas for specific types of articles or columns, guest commentators, regular features, ideas for locations to place our paper.
item.name: People's Pen Committee Meeting
